meanings.definition: Connect or link (two or more things) together.
meanings.sent1: She interlinks the puzzle pieces to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The internet interlinks people from all around the world.
meanings.sent3: The magician interlinks the rings to create a mesmerizing illusion.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music interlinks with his talent to create beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: The vines interlink to form a strong, interconnected network in the forest.

meanings.definition: A connection or link between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The interlinks between the two buildings allow easy access for commuters.
meanings.sent2: The interlinks in the chain are strong and durable.
meanings.sent3: The interlinks in the friendship bracelet symbolize the bond between friends.
meanings.sent4: The interlinks of fate brought them together in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The interlinks of the gears ensure smooth operation of the machinery.
